89  /**
90   * Tool to load the output of HFileOutputFormat into an existing table.
91   * @see #usage()
92   */
93  public class LoadIncrementalHFiles extends Configured implements Tool {
94  
95    private static Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(LoadIncrementalHFiles.class);
96    private static final int  TABLE_CREATE_MAX_RETRIES = 20;
97    private static final long TABLE_CREATE_SLEEP = 60000;
98    static AtomicLong regionCount = new AtomicLong(0);
99    private HBaseAdmin hbAdmin;
100   private Configuration cfg;
101 
102   public static String NAME = "completebulkload";
103 
104   private boolean useSecure;
105   private boolean hasForwardedToken;
106   private Token<?> userToken;
107   private String bulkToken;
108 
109   //package private for testing
110   LoadIncrementalHFiles(Configuration conf, Boolean useSecure) throws Exception {
111     super(conf);
112     this.cfg = conf;
113     this.hbAdmin = new HBaseAdmin(conf);
114     //added simple for testing
115     this.useSecure = useSecure != null ? useSecure : User.isHBaseSecurityEnabled(conf);
116   }
117 
118   public LoadIncrementalHFiles(Configuration conf) throws Exception {
119     this(conf, null);
120   }
121 
122   private void usage() {
123     System.err.println("usage: " + NAME +
124         " /path/to/hfileoutputformat-output " +
125         "tablename");
126   }
127 
128   /**
129    * Represents an HFile waiting to be loaded. An queue is used
130    * in this class in order to support the case where a region has
131    * split during the process of the load. When this happens,
132    * the HFile is split into two physical parts across the new
133    * region boundary, and each part is added back into the queue.
134    * The import process finishes when the queue is empty.
135    */
136   static class LoadQueueItem {
137     final byte[] family;
138     final Path hfilePath;
139 
140     public LoadQueueItem(byte[] family, Path hfilePath) {
141       this.family = family;
142       this.hfilePath = hfilePath;
143     }
144 
145     public String toString() {
146       return "family:"+ Bytes.toString(family) + " path:" + hfilePath.toString();
147     }
148   }
149 
150   /**
151    * Walk the given directory for all HFiles, and return a Queue
152    * containing all such files.
153    */
154   private void discoverLoadQueue(Deque<LoadQueueItem> ret, Path hfofDir)
155   throws IOException {
156     FileSystem fs = hfofDir.getFileSystem(getConf());
157 
158     if (!fs.exists(hfofDir)) {
159       throw new FileNotFoundException("HFileOutputFormat dir " +
160           hfofDir + " not found");
161     }
162 
163     FileStatus[] familyDirStatuses = fs.listStatus(hfofDir);
164     if (familyDirStatuses == null) {
165       throw new FileNotFoundException("No families found in " + hfofDir);
166     }
167 
168     for (FileStatus stat : familyDirStatuses) {
169       if (!stat.isDir()) {
170         LOG.warn("Skipping non-directory " + stat.getPath());
171         continue;
172       }
173       Path familyDir = stat.getPath();
174       // Skip _logs, etc
175       if (familyDir.getName().startsWith("_")) continue;
176       byte[] family = familyDir.getName().getBytes();
177       Path[] hfiles = FileUtil.stat2Paths(fs.listStatus(familyDir));
178       for (Path hfile : hfiles) {
179         if (hfile.getName().startsWith("_")) continue;
180         ret.add(new LoadQueueItem(family, hfile));
181       }
182     }
183   }
184 
185   /**
186    * Perform a bulk load of the given directory into the given
187    * pre-existing table.  This method is not threadsafe.
188    * 
189    * @param hfofDir the directory that was provided as the output path
190    * of a job using HFileOutputFormat
191    * @param table the table to load into
192    * @throws TableNotFoundException if table does not yet exist
193    */
194   public void doBulkLoad(Path hfofDir, final HTable table)
195     throws TableNotFoundException, IOException
196   {
197     final HConnection conn = table.getConnection();
198 
199     if (!conn.isTableAvailable(table.getTableName())) {
200       throw new TableNotFoundException("Table " +
201           Bytes.toStringBinary(table.getTableName()) +
202           "is not currently available.");
203     }
204 
205     // initialize thread pools
206     int nrThreads = cfg.getInt("hbase.loadincremental.threads.max",
207         Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors());
208     ThreadFactoryBuilder builder = new ThreadFactoryBuilder();
209     builder.setNameFormat("LoadIncrementalHFiles-%1$d");
210     ExecutorService pool = new ThreadPoolExecutor(nrThreads, nrThreads,
211         60, TimeUnit.SECONDS,
212         new LinkedBlockingQueue<Runnable>(),
213         builder.build());
214     ((ThreadPoolExecutor)pool).allowCoreThreadTimeOut(true);
215 
216     // LQI queue does not need to be threadsafe -- all operations on this queue
217     // happen in this thread
218     Deque<LoadQueueItem> queue = new LinkedList<LoadQueueItem>();
219     try {
220       discoverLoadQueue(queue, hfofDir);
221       int count = 0;
222 
223       if (queue.isEmpty()) {
224         LOG.warn("Bulk load operation did not find any files to load in " +
225             "directory " + hfofDir.toUri() + ".  Does it contain files in " +
226             "subdirectories that correspond to column family names?");
227         return;
228       }
229 
230       //If using secure bulk load
231       //prepare staging directory and token
232       if(useSecure) {
233         //This condition is here for unit testing
234         //Since delegation token doesn't work in mini cluster
235         if(User.isSecurityEnabled()) {
236           FileSystem fs = FileSystem.get(cfg);
237           userToken = User.getCurrent().getToken("HDFS_DELEGATION_TOKEN",
238                                                  fs.getCanonicalServiceName());
239           if (userToken == null) {
240             hasForwardedToken = false;
241             userToken = fs.getDelegationToken("renewer");
242           } else {
243             hasForwardedToken = true;
244             LOG.info("Use the existing token: " + userToken);
245           }
246         }
247         bulkToken = new SecureBulkLoadClient(table).prepareBulkLoad(table.getTableName());
248       }
249 
250       // Assumes that region splits can happen while this occurs.
251       while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
252         // need to reload split keys each iteration.
253         final Pair<byte[][], byte[][]> startEndKeys = table.getStartEndKeys();
254         if (count != 0) {
255           LOG.info("Split occured while grouping HFiles, retry attempt " +
256               + count + " with " + queue.size() + " files remaining to group or split");
257         }
258 
259         int maxRetries = cfg.getInt("hbase.bulkload.retries.number", 0);
260         if (maxRetries != 0 && count >= maxRetries) {
261           LOG.error("Retry attempted " + count +  " times without completing, bailing out");
262           return;
263         }
264         count++;
265 
266         // Using ByteBuffer for byte[] equality semantics
267         Multimap<ByteBuffer, LoadQueueItem> regionGroups = groupOrSplitPhase(table,
268             pool, queue, startEndKeys);
269 
270         bulkLoadPhase(table, conn, pool, queue, regionGroups);
271 
272         // NOTE: The next iteration's split / group could happen in parallel to
273         // atomic bulkloads assuming that there are splits and no merges, and
274         // that we can atomically pull out the groups we want to retry.
275       }
276 
277     } finally {
278       if(useSecure) {
279         if(userToken != null && !hasForwardedToken) {
280           try {
281             userToken.cancel(cfg);
282           } catch (Exception e) {
283             LOG.warn("Failed to cancel HDFS delegation token.", e);
284           }
285         }
286         if(bulkToken != null) {
287           new SecureBulkLoadClient(table).cleanupBulkLoad(bulkToken);
288         }
289       }
290       pool.shutdown();
291       if (queue != null && !queue.isEmpty()) {
292         StringBuilder err = new StringBuilder();
293         err.append("-------------------------------------------------\n");
294         err.append("Bulk load aborted with some files not yet loaded:\n");
295         err.append("-------------------------------------------------\n");
296         for (LoadQueueItem q : queue) {
297           err.append("  ").append(q.hfilePath).append('\n');
298         }
299         LOG.error(err);
300       }
301     }
302   }
303 
304   /**
305    * This takes the LQI's grouped by likely regions and attempts to bulk load
306    * them.  Any failures are re-queued for another pass with the
307    * groupOrSplitPhase.
308    */
309   protected void bulkLoadPhase(final HTable table, final HConnection conn,
310       ExecutorService pool, Deque<LoadQueueItem> queue,
311       final Multimap<ByteBuffer, LoadQueueItem> regionGroups) throws IOException {
312     // atomically bulk load the groups.
313     Set<Future<List<LoadQueueItem>>> loadingFutures = new HashSet<Future<List<LoadQueueItem>>>();
314     for (Entry<ByteBuffer, ? extends Collection<LoadQueueItem>> e: regionGroups.asMap().entrySet()) {
315       final byte[] first = e.getKey().array();
316       final Collection<LoadQueueItem> lqis =  e.getValue();
317 
318       final Callable<List<LoadQueueItem>> call = new Callable<List<LoadQueueItem>>() {
319         public List<LoadQueueItem> call() throws Exception {
320           List<LoadQueueItem> toRetry = tryAtomicRegionLoad(conn, table.getTableName(), first, lqis);
321           return toRetry;
322         }
323       };
324       loadingFutures.add(pool.submit(call));
325     }
326 
327     // get all the results.
328     for (Future<List<LoadQueueItem>> future : loadingFutures) {
329       try {
330         List<LoadQueueItem> toRetry = future.get();
331 
332         // LQIs that are requeued to be regrouped.
333         queue.addAll(toRetry);
334 
335       } catch (ExecutionException e1) {
336         Throwable t = e1.getCause();
337         if (t instanceof IOException) {
338           // At this point something unrecoverable has happened.
339           // TODO Implement bulk load recovery
340           throw new IOException("BulkLoad encountered an unrecoverable problem", t);
341         }
342         LOG.error("Unexpected execution exception during bulk load", e1);
343         throw new IllegalStateException(t);
344       } catch (InterruptedException e1) {
345         LOG.error("Unexpected interrupted exception during bulk load", e1);
346         throw new IllegalStateException(e1);
347       }
348     }
349   }
350 
351   /**
352    * @return A Multimap<startkey, LoadQueueItem> that groups LQI by likely
353    * bulk load region targets.
354    */
355   private Multimap<ByteBuffer, LoadQueueItem> groupOrSplitPhase(final HTable table,
356       ExecutorService pool, Deque<LoadQueueItem> queue,
357       final Pair<byte[][], byte[][]> startEndKeys) throws IOException {
358     // <region start key, LQI> need synchronized only within this scope of this
359     // phase because of the puts that happen in futures.
360     Multimap<ByteBuffer, LoadQueueItem> rgs = HashMultimap.create();
361     final Multimap<ByteBuffer, LoadQueueItem> regionGroups = Multimaps.synchronizedMultimap(rgs);
362 
363     // drain LQIs and figure out bulk load groups
364     Set<Future<List<LoadQueueItem>>> splittingFutures = new HashSet<Future<List<LoadQueueItem>>>();
365     while (!queue.isEmpty()) {
366       final LoadQueueItem item = queue.remove();
367       
368       final Callable<List<LoadQueueItem>> call = new Callable<List<LoadQueueItem>>() {
369         public List<LoadQueueItem> call() throws Exception {
370           List<LoadQueueItem> splits = groupOrSplit(regionGroups, item, table, startEndKeys);
371           return splits;
372         }
373       };
374       splittingFutures.add(pool.submit(call));
375     }
376     // get all the results.  All grouping and splitting must finish before
377     // we can attempt the atomic loads.
378     for (Future<List<LoadQueueItem>> lqis : splittingFutures) {
379       try {
380         List<LoadQueueItem> splits = lqis.get();
381         if (splits != null) {
382           queue.addAll(splits);
383         }
384       } catch (ExecutionException e1) {
385         Throwable t = e1.getCause();
386         if (t instanceof IOException) {
387           LOG.error("IOException during splitting", e1);
388           throw (IOException)t; // would have been thrown if not parallelized,
389         }
390         LOG.error("Unexpected execution exception during splitting", e1);
391         throw new IllegalStateException(t);
392       } catch (InterruptedException e1) {
393         LOG.error("Unexpected interrupted exception during splitting", e1);
394         throw new IllegalStateException(e1);
395       }
396     }
397     return regionGroups;
398   }
399 
400   // unique file name for the table
401   String getUniqueName(byte[] tableName) {
402     String name = Bytes.toStringBinary(tableName) + "," + regionCount.incrementAndGet();
403     return name;
404   }
405 
406   protected List<LoadQueueItem> splitStoreFile(final LoadQueueItem item,
407       final HTable table, byte[] startKey,
408       byte[] splitKey) throws IOException {
409     final Path hfilePath = item.hfilePath;
410 
411     // We use a '_' prefix which is ignored when walking directory trees
412     // above.
413     final Path tmpDir = new Path(item.hfilePath.getParent(), "_tmp");
414 
415     LOG.info("HFile at " + hfilePath + " no longer fits inside a single " +
416     "region. Splitting...");
417 
418     String uniqueName = getUniqueName(table.getTableName());
419     HColumnDescriptor familyDesc = table.getTableDescriptor().getFamily(item.family);
420     Path botOut = new Path(tmpDir, uniqueName + ".bottom");
421     Path topOut = new Path(tmpDir, uniqueName + ".top");
422     splitStoreFile(getConf(), hfilePath, familyDesc, splitKey,
423         botOut, topOut);
424 
425     // Add these back at the *front* of the queue, so there's a lower
426     // chance that the region will just split again before we get there.
427     List<LoadQueueItem> lqis = new ArrayList<LoadQueueItem>(2);
428     lqis.add(new LoadQueueItem(item.family, botOut));
429     lqis.add(new LoadQueueItem(item.family, topOut));
430 
431     LOG.info("Successfully split into new HFiles " + botOut + " and " + topOut);
432     return lqis;
433   }
434 
435   /**
436    * Attempt to assign the given load queue item into its target region group.
437    * If the hfile boundary no longer fits into a region, physically splits
438    * the hfile such that the new bottom half will fit and returns the list of
439    * LQI's corresponding to the resultant hfiles.
440    *
441    * protected for testing
442    */
443   protected List<LoadQueueItem> groupOrSplit(Multimap<ByteBuffer, LoadQueueItem> regionGroups,
444       final LoadQueueItem item, final HTable table,
445       final Pair<byte[][], byte[][]> startEndKeys)
446       throws IOException {
447     final Path hfilePath = item.hfilePath;
448     final FileSystem fs = hfilePath.getFileSystem(getConf());
449     HFile.Reader hfr = HFile.createReader(fs, hfilePath,
450         new CacheConfig(getConf()));
451     final byte[] first, last;
452     try {
453       hfr.loadFileInfo();
454       first = hfr.getFirstRowKey();
455       last = hfr.getLastRowKey();
456     }  finally {
457       hfr.close();
458     }
459 
460     LOG.info("Trying to load hfile=" + hfilePath +
461         " first=" + Bytes.toStringBinary(first) +
462         " last="  + Bytes.toStringBinary(last));
463     if (first == null || last == null) {
464       assert first == null && last == null;
465       // TODO what if this is due to a bad HFile?
466       LOG.info("hfile " + hfilePath + " has no entries, skipping");
467       return null;
468     }
469     if (Bytes.compareTo(first, last) > 0) {
470       throw new IllegalArgumentException(
471       "Invalid range: " + Bytes.toStringBinary(first) +
472       " > " + Bytes.toStringBinary(last));
473     }
474     int idx = Arrays.binarySearch(startEndKeys.getFirst(), first,
475         Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
476     if (idx < 0) {
477       // not on boundary, returns -(insertion index).  Calculate region it
478       // would be in.
479       idx = -(idx + 1) - 1;
480     }
481     final int indexForCallable = idx;
482     boolean lastKeyInRange =
483       Bytes.compareTo(last, startEndKeys.getSecond()[idx]) < 0 ||
484       Bytes.equals(startEndKeys.getSecond()[idx], HConstants.EMPTY_BYTE_ARRAY);
485     if (!lastKeyInRange) {
486       List<LoadQueueItem> lqis = splitStoreFile(item, table,
487           startEndKeys.getFirst()[indexForCallable],
488           startEndKeys.getSecond()[indexForCallable]);
489       return lqis;
490     }
491 
492     // group regions.
493     regionGroups.put(ByteBuffer.wrap(startEndKeys.getFirst()[idx]), item);
494     return null;
495   }
496 
497   /**
498    * Attempts to do an atomic load of many hfiles into a region.  If it fails,
499    * it returns a list of hfiles that need to be retried.  If it is successful
500    * it will return an empty list.
501    * 
502    * NOTE: To maintain row atomicity guarantees, region server callable should
503    * succeed atomically and fails atomically.
504    * 
505    * Protected for testing.
506    * 
507    * @return empty list if success, list of items to retry on recoverable
508    * failure
509    */
510   protected List<LoadQueueItem> tryAtomicRegionLoad(final HConnection conn,
511       byte[] tableName, final byte[] first, Collection<LoadQueueItem> lqis) throws IOException {
512 
513     final List<Pair<byte[], String>> famPaths =
514       new ArrayList<Pair<byte[], String>>(lqis.size());
515     for (LoadQueueItem lqi : lqis) {
516       famPaths.add(Pair.newPair(lqi.family, lqi.hfilePath.toString()));
517     }
518 
519     final ServerCallable<Boolean> svrCallable = new ServerCallable<Boolean>(conn,
520         tableName, first) {
521       @Override
522       public Boolean call() throws Exception {
523         SecureBulkLoadClient secureClient = null;
524         boolean success = false;
525 
526         try {
527           LOG.debug("Going to connect to server " + location + " for row "
528               + Bytes.toStringBinary(row));
529           byte[] regionName = location.getRegionInfo().getRegionName();
530           if(!useSecure) {
531             success = server.bulkLoadHFiles(famPaths, regionName);
532           } else {
533             HTable table = new HTable(conn.getConfiguration(), tableName);
534             secureClient = new SecureBulkLoadClient(table, location.getRegionInfo().getStartKey());
535             success = secureClient.bulkLoadHFiles(famPaths, userToken, bulkToken);
536           }
537           return success;
538         } finally {
539           //Best effort copying of files that might not have been imported
540           //from the staging directory back to original location
541           //in user directory
542           if(secureClient != null && !success) {
543             FileSystem fs = FileSystem.get(cfg);
544             for(Pair<byte[], String> el : famPaths) {
545               Path hfileStagingPath = null;
546               Path hfileOrigPath = new Path(el.getSecond());
547               try {
548                 hfileStagingPath= new Path(secureClient.getStagingPath(bulkToken, el.getFirst()),
549                     hfileOrigPath.getName());
550                 if(fs.rename(hfileStagingPath, hfileOrigPath)) {
551                   LOG.debug("Moved back file " + hfileOrigPath + " from " +
552                       hfileStagingPath);
553                 } else if(fs.exists(hfileStagingPath)){
554                   LOG.debug("Unable to move back file " + hfileOrigPath + " from " +
555                       hfileStagingPath);
556                 }
557               } catch(Exception ex) {
558                 LOG.debug("Unable to move back file " + hfileOrigPath + " from " +
559                     hfileStagingPath, ex);
560               }
561             }
562           }
563         }
564       }
565 
566     };
567 
568     try {
569       List<LoadQueueItem> toRetry = new ArrayList<LoadQueueItem>();
570       boolean success = svrCallable.withRetries();
571       if (!success) {
572         LOG.warn("Attempt to bulk load region containing "
573             + Bytes.toStringBinary(first) + " into table "
574             + Bytes.toStringBinary(tableName)  + " with files " + lqis
575             + " failed.  This is recoverable and they will be retried.");
576         toRetry.addAll(lqis); // return lqi's to retry
577       }
578       // success
579       return toRetry;
580     } catch (IOException e) {
581       LOG.error("Encountered unrecoverable error from region server", e);
582       throw e;
583     }
584   }
585 
586   /**
587    * Split a storefile into a top and bottom half, maintaining
588    * the metadata, recreating bloom filters, etc.
589    */
590   static void splitStoreFile(
591       Configuration conf, Path inFile,
592       HColumnDescriptor familyDesc, byte[] splitKey,
593       Path bottomOut, Path topOut) throws IOException
594   {
595     // Open reader with no block cache, and not in-memory
596     Reference topReference = new Reference(splitKey, Range.top);
597     Reference bottomReference = new Reference(splitKey, Range.bottom);
598 
599     copyHFileHalf(conf, inFile, topOut, topReference, familyDesc);
600     copyHFileHalf(conf, inFile, bottomOut, bottomReference, familyDesc);
601   }
602 
603   /**
604    * Copy half of an HFile into a new HFile.
605    */
606   private static void copyHFileHalf(
607       Configuration conf, Path inFile, Path outFile, Reference reference,
608       HColumnDescriptor familyDescriptor)
609   throws IOException {
610     FileSystem fs = inFile.getFileSystem(conf);
611     CacheConfig cacheConf = new CacheConfig(conf);
612     HalfStoreFileReader halfReader = null;
613     StoreFile.Writer halfWriter = null;
614     HFileDataBlockEncoder dataBlockEncoder = new HFileDataBlockEncoderImpl(
615         familyDescriptor.getDataBlockEncodingOnDisk(),
616         familyDescriptor.getDataBlockEncoding());
617     try {
618       halfReader = new HalfStoreFileReader(fs, inFile, cacheConf,
619           reference, DataBlockEncoding.NONE);
620       Map<byte[], byte[]> fileInfo = halfReader.loadFileInfo();
621 
622       int blocksize = familyDescriptor.getBlocksize();
623       Algorithm compression = familyDescriptor.getCompression();
624       BloomType bloomFilterType = familyDescriptor.getBloomFilterType();
625 
626       halfWriter = new StoreFile.WriterBuilder(conf, cacheConf,
627           fs, blocksize)
628               .withFilePath(outFile)
629               .withCompression(compression)
630               .withDataBlockEncoder(dataBlockEncoder)
631               .withBloomType(bloomFilterType)
632               .withChecksumType(Store.getChecksumType(conf))
633               .withBytesPerChecksum(Store.getBytesPerChecksum(conf))
634               .build();
635       HFileScanner scanner = halfReader.getScanner(false, false, false);
636       scanner.seekTo();
637       do {
638         KeyValue kv = scanner.getKeyValue();
639         halfWriter.append(kv);
640       } while (scanner.next());
641 
642       for (Map.Entry<byte[],byte[]> entry : fileInfo.entrySet()) {
643         if (shouldCopyHFileMetaKey(entry.getKey())) {
644           halfWriter.appendFileInfo(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
645         }
646       }
647     } finally {
648       if (halfWriter != null) halfWriter.close();
649       if (halfReader != null) halfReader.close(cacheConf.shouldEvictOnClose());
650     }
651   }
652 
653   private static boolean shouldCopyHFileMetaKey(byte[] key) {
654     return !HFile.isReservedFileInfoKey(key);
655   }
656 
657   private boolean doesTableExist(String tableName) throws Exception {
658     return hbAdmin.tableExists(tableName);
659   }
660   
661   /*
662    * Infers region boundaries for a new table.
663    * Parameter:
664    *   bdryMap is a map between keys to an integer belonging to {+1, -1}
665    *     If a key is a start key of a file, then it maps to +1
666    *     If a key is an end key of a file, then it maps to -1
667    * Algo:
668    * 1) Poll on the keys in order: 
669    *    a) Keep adding the mapped values to these keys (runningSum) 
670    *    b) Each time runningSum reaches 0, add the start Key from when the runningSum had started to a boundary list.
671    * 2) Return the boundary list. 
672    */
673   public static byte[][] inferBoundaries(TreeMap<byte[], Integer> bdryMap) {
674     ArrayList<byte[]> keysArray = new ArrayList<byte[]>();
675     int runningValue = 0;
676     byte[] currStartKey = null;
677     boolean firstBoundary = true;
678     
679     for (Map.Entry<byte[], Integer> item: bdryMap.entrySet()) {
680       if (runningValue == 0) currStartKey = item.getKey();
681       runningValue += item.getValue();
682       if (runningValue == 0) {
683         if (!firstBoundary) keysArray.add(currStartKey);
684         firstBoundary = false;
685       } 
686     }
687     
688     return keysArray.toArray(new byte[0][0]);
689   }
690  
691   /*
692    * If the table is created for the first time, then "completebulkload" reads the files twice.
693    * More modifications necessary if we want to avoid doing it.
694    */
695   private void createTable(String tableName, String dirPath) throws Exception {
696     Path hfofDir = new Path(dirPath);
697     FileSystem fs = hfofDir.getFileSystem(getConf());
698 
699     if (!fs.exists(hfofDir)) {
700       throw new FileNotFoundException("HFileOutputFormat dir " +
701           hfofDir + " not found");
702     }
703 
704     FileStatus[] familyDirStatuses = fs.listStatus(hfofDir);
705     if (familyDirStatuses == null) {
706       throw new FileNotFoundException("No families found in " + hfofDir);
707     }
708 
709     HTableDescriptor htd = new HTableDescriptor(tableName);
710     HColumnDescriptor hcd = null;
711 
712     // Add column families
713     // Build a set of keys
714     byte[][] keys = null;
715     TreeMap<byte[], Integer> map = new TreeMap<byte[], Integer>(Bytes.BYTES_COMPARATOR);
716     
717     for (FileStatus stat : familyDirStatuses) {
718       if (!stat.isDir()) {
719         LOG.warn("Skipping non-directory " + stat.getPath());
720         continue;
721       }
722       Path familyDir = stat.getPath();
723       // Skip _logs, etc
724       if (familyDir.getName().startsWith("_")) continue;
725       byte[] family = familyDir.getName().getBytes();
726      
727       hcd = new HColumnDescriptor(family);
728       htd.addFamily(hcd);
729       
730       Path[] hfiles = FileUtil.stat2Paths(fs.listStatus(familyDir));
731       for (Path hfile : hfiles) {
732         if (hfile.getName().startsWith("_")) continue;
733         HFile.Reader reader = HFile.createReader(fs, hfile,
734             new CacheConfig(getConf()));
735         final byte[] first, last;
736         try {
737           if (hcd.getCompressionType() != reader.getCompressionAlgorithm()) {
738             hcd.setCompressionType(reader.getCompressionAlgorithm());
739             LOG.info("Setting compression " + hcd.getCompressionType().name() +
740                      " for family " + hcd.toString());
741           }
742           reader.loadFileInfo();
743           first = reader.getFirstRowKey();
744           last =  reader.getLastRowKey();
745 
746           LOG.info("Trying to figure out region boundaries hfile=" + hfile +
747             " first=" + Bytes.toStringBinary(first) +
748             " last="  + Bytes.toStringBinary(last));
749           
750           // To eventually infer start key-end key boundaries
751           Integer value = map.containsKey(first)?(Integer)map.get(first):0;
752           map.put(first, value+1);
753 
754           value = map.containsKey(last)?(Integer)map.get(last):0;
755           map.put(last, value-1);
756         }  finally {
757           reader.close();
758         }
759       }
760     }
761     
762     keys = LoadIncrementalHFiles.inferBoundaries(map);
763     this.hbAdmin.createTable(htd,keys);
764 
765     LOG.info("Table "+ tableName +" is available!!");
766   }
767 
768   @Override
769   public int run(String[] args) throws Exception {
770     if (args.length != 2) {
771       usage();
772       return -1;
773     }
774 
775     String dirPath   = args[0];
776     String tableName = args[1];
777 
778     boolean tableExists   = this.doesTableExist(tableName);
779     if (!tableExists) this.createTable(tableName,dirPath);
780 
781     Path hfofDir = new Path(dirPath);
782     HTable table = new HTable(this.cfg, tableName);
783 
784     doBulkLoad(hfofDir, table);
785     return 0;
786   }
787 
788   public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
789     int ret = ToolRunner.run(new LoadIncrementalHFiles(HBaseConfiguration.create()), args);
790     System.exit(ret);
791   }
